name: FeedEm
description:
Being a father is hard work, trust me I know.

This is a very basic life simulator, find the food that your children wants or they die!

FeedEm is a Ludum Dare game created in 16 hours. 

Use arrow buttons or joypad. 

PS. You can only carry one food item at a time. If you pickup another item the first one will be lost, so don't waste food you'll need it later. 

If you rate this game for Ludum Dare make sure you pick version v0.5.0.
The other versions are created after the jam and contains updates and enhancements. 

Feedback

Join our Discord server to discuss or provide feedback on the game.
